backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that handles user profiles and full CRUD operations for escalations with simple auth checks and admin role support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping file listing implemented features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication flow, profile bootstrap logic, and routing for escalation CRUD pages.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main app layout with navigation, user profile display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapErr: Displays a readable error screen for profile-loading failures with logout recovery.
frontend/src/components/escalations/Dele: Confirmation dialog for deleting an escalation with disabled states during deletion.
frontend/src/components/escalations/Esca: Form component for creating or editing escalations, handling state, validation flags, and submission.
UI filter panel allowing users to filter escalations by status, area, group, name, manager, and date range.
Displays grouped escalation counts by status, functional area, and business group using summary cards.
Sortable table listing escalations with navigation to details and support for multiple sort fields.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users to enter and save their name before using the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useEscalationsFilters: Provides filter state, filtered results, summary counts, and unique value extraction for escalations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, stored identities, and provider context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for loading and mutating user profiles and escalations via an actor API, including list, get, create, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
Page for creating a new escalation using a form and mutation hook, with navigation back to the list.
Displays details of a single escalation with loading/error states and options to edit or delete it.
frontend/src/pages/EscalationEditPage.ts: Allows editing an escalation using fetched data and an update mutation, with navigation back to detail view.
frontend/src/pages/EscalationsListPage.t: Lists all escalations with filters, summaries, and table view, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with basic error handling and UI feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, radius, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, issues, and metadata for a web-based escalation tracking app with noted sign‑in error.
